title: Interceptors
summary: Interceptors are a speedy but fragile ship class that are similar to Fighters. They can be used similarly to fighters or as exploration craft. Hybrid and Tier 2 ships offer different playstyles, but are harder to acquire.
full_text:
Interceptors are a speedy but fragile ship class that are similar to Fighters. They can be used similarly to fighters or as exploration craft. Hybrid and Tier 2 ships offer different playstyles, but are harder to acquire.
